title: I will be using flex q to troll
body:
It won't affect my solo/duo q rating and I need to get my revenge on all those dynamic q abusers.

If you get me on your "flex Q team" consider dodging.

replies.body: *yawn* just a salty crybaby everyone move on
I don't hate the premades, I hate Riot for forcing me to play with them.
Actually, you get rewards after the season ends for the flex que, AND more swag when you get both solo and flex into gold.

the preseason flex q still counts toward your SOLO/DUO rating until the actual new soloq appears in 2017 its probably in your best interest to get your group ASAP and rock the flex q, but having a premade doesnt mean the solo players automatically lose in fact its rare to even run into a premade and usually the premades dont function well at all so it doesnt make sense to troll flex queue when that doesnt really change the personal skill level requirement

also if its the same as the summer time dynamic queue you wont even get matched with premades and all the solo players in flex queue with get matched with other solo players unless its 3am
